title: The 5th Wave
writer: Susannah Grant, Akiva Goldsman, Jeff Pinkner
short_cast: Chloë Grace Moretz, Nick Robinson, Ron Livingston, Maggie Siff, Alex Roe, Maria Bello, Maika Monroe, Zackary Arthur, Liev Schreiber
cast: Chloë Grace Moretz, Nick Robinson, Ron Livingston, Maggie Siff, Alex Roe, Maria Bello, Maika Monroe, Zackary Arthur, Liev Schreiber

desc: After four waves of destruction turn Earth into a wasteland, a teen desperate to find her brother teams with a stranger to prepare for the fifth.
